documentation/openapi.description: This is the api gateway for the solomon ai backend

auth/validator.@comment: Enable a JWK shared cache amongst all endpoints of 15 minutes

endpoints.@comment: purpose: endpoint used to register a user profile against our backend

qos/ratelimit/router.@comment: A hundred thousand requests every second

endpoints.@comment: purpose: logs out a profile. TODO: for now this will not work. need to pass the userID instead

qos/ratelimit/router.@comment: A hundred thousand requests every second

endpoints.@comment: purpose: authenticates a user with our backend given we are provided with a set of credentials. returned is an object { account: {} profile: {} jwt: xxxxxx }

qos/ratelimit/router.@comment: A hundred thousand requests every second

backend.@comment: we query for the userID based on the provided user email
we call the social service to obtain the social profile of the user
we call the financial service to obtain the financial profile of the user
we call the authentication service with the user credentials in hopes of obtaining a jwt token

endpoints.@comment: purpose: endpoint used to explicitly authenticate a user

endpoints.@comment: purpose: endpoint used to request to reset a users password

backend.@comment: we query for the account based on the provided authzero user id and the profile type
